casebody.data:
Akron Bar Association v. Hoffer.

[Cite as Akron Bar Assn. v. Hoffer (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 1226.]

(No. 98-2640 Submitted and decided February 17, 2000.)

*1227For earlier case, see Akron Bar Assn. v. Hoffer (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 97, 712 N.E.2d 116.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Oook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
